attributes.action: Stop giving tax payers to the royal family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take back royal palaces/ property into public ownership.
allow the royal family to live as ordinary citisens
in this modern society why should we be paying for them to live the life of luxury, when we have problems paying our way

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
